metadataAttributes.Title: IBM Introduction to Machine Learning Specialization
metadataAttributes.Short Intro: Learn machine learning through real use cases. Build the skills for a career in one of the most relevant fields of modern AI through hands-on projects and curriculum from IBM’s experts.
metadataAttributes.Skills: Machine Learning Regression, Machine Learning Classification, Machine Learning, Unsupervised Learning, Exploratory Data Analysis, Artificial Intelligence (AI), Feature Engineering, Statistical Hypothesis Testing, Regression Analysis, Supervised Learning, Linear Regression, Ridge Regression,
metadataAttributes.Instructors: Joseph Santarcangelo ,Svitlana (Lana) Kramar ,Mark J Grover ,Miguel Maldonado ,Yan Luo ,Xintong Li ,
